Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista Flex reagent cartridges packaging modification for use on Dimension Vista Integrated System for multiple analytes.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of multiple analytes (drugs, enzymes, metabolites) in serum, plasma, urine, and cerebrospinal fluid, aiding in diagnosis and treatment of overdose, metabolic, liver, renal, and endocrine disorders and in therapeutic drug monitoring.
